;+
;> TEMPLATE34 = '08572+3915'
;> TEMPLATE68 = '00183-7111'
;
;  The 3.4 um HAC feature of 08572+3915 has tau=0.8 from
;  Imanishi et al. (2006), and the 6.85 um HAC feature from 
;  the GTO Spitzer/IRS spectrum has tau=0.24, giving a HAC
;  tau(3.4)/tau(6.85)~3.3.
;-

;~            WAVE          OPACITY
